column4: Hello. Can somone please help. i cannot access directory /opt
1.) why are you root 2.) there is no /opt directory on your system
move that file out to a different name, mkdir /opt
I get "/opt: gzip compressed data, from Unix, last modified: Mon Feb 11 09:24:23 2008
welcome, please do "sudo mkdir /opt" to stop further problems
ubuntu does not make you root by default
mint linux is not supported here
please join a mint linux support area
